com.castlabs.android.player

Interface PlaybackStateStorage


  • public interface PlaybackStateStorage
    Implementations of this interface offer the basic infrastructure to load and save instances of PlaybackState
    Since:
    1.4.5

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the storage and deletes all entries
      void delete(PlaybackState state)
      Deletes teh given entry from the storage
      PlaybackState load(java.lang.String url)
      Loads and returns the playback state for the given given url.
      void save(PlaybackState state)
      Persists the given playback state instance

    • Method Detail

      • load

        @NonNull
PlaybackState load(@NonNull
                            java.lang.String url)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads and returns the playback state for the given given url.
        Parameters:
        url - the playback content url
        Returns:
        the playback state for the given url or a new initial state
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case an error occurred while loading the playback state instance

      • save

        void save(@NonNull
          PlaybackState state)
   throws java.lang.Exception
        Persists the given playback state instance
        Parameters:
        state - the state instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case an error occurred while persisting

     throws java.lang.Exception
        Deletes teh given entry from the storage
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of an error
